title: Lunar Guardian Borders without Skin?
body: If I'd get, for example, that lunar guardian warwick border, would I be able to actually use it without using or having the lunar guardian skin of warwick? I'd like to be showing my grey warwick, can i additionally show the border in the loading screen or nah?

replies.body: You can get the border, without owning the skin. But it won't be shown unless you are playing warwick with that skin.
